turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to order some pizza from the the new pizzeria Bella Luna's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can help you order. what did you want from bella lunas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I'd like to order three medium pizzas, and as far as the toppings go, I guess I'd maybe I'd want them to be I'm thinking maybe a specialty pizza, meat lover's. Make one of them a meat lover's, one a veggie lover, and the other one a chicken barbecue pizza. And please make sure that they are they have gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That comes with the pizza also.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want gluten free crust for all three pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, so you want 3 medium pizzas, 1 meat lovers, 1 veggie lovers, and 1 chicken bbq, all with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $32 is your total for this order. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed. the pizzas will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, ma'am. That will be it.
